headline: F.B.I. Detains Members of Neo-Nazi Group Ahead of Rally
abstract: The three men had obtained guns and discussed traveling to Virginia for protests against new gun control measures, officials said.
lead_paragraph: RICHMOND, Va. â€” Alarming calls online for a race war. The arrest of three suspected neo-Nazis. Memories of the explosive clashes in Charlottesville, Va., three years ago.
